bug.short_desc: [e4] ensure that Mylyn works on Eclipse 4

long_desc.thetext: Head does not currently compile on Eclipse 4.0 due to usage of platform internals that are not part of the Eclipse 3.x compatibility layer. The code needs to be refactored to compile and work on Eclipse 4.0.
The order of the Task List toolbar buttons is not the same as on Eclipse 3.x: bug 319704.
Created attachment 178366 fix for compile errors (breaks editor management)

We now have an automated build and test job. It currently runs against Eclipse 4.1M2:
http://mylyn.eclipse.org/hudson/job/mylyn-build-e4.0/ http://mylyn.eclipse.org/hudson/job/mylyn-test-e4.0/
Issues that need to be investigated: * Focus button in task list is not enabled on startup * Task List category gradients do not appear on Gtk * Work week progress bar is not hidden
I have changed a few calls that handle editor restore to use reflection. That means the e_4_0_m_3_x branch is no longer needed and we now build and test all against all platform streams from master.

attachment.desc: fix for compile errors (breaks editor management)
